isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - CRANKSHAFT DAMPER AND/OR FRONT SEAL (I-6), REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: CRANKSHAFT DAMPER AND/OR FRONT SEAL (I-6), REPLACE
wtsproc.config: This vehicle is equipped with air conditioning. The cooling system consists of radiator, charge air cooler and shroud as a complete assembly.

step1.para: Chock wheels. Open hood.
Disconnect battery.
Remove front bumper.
Disconnect hood wiring at harness, using suitable table to support hood. Disconnect hood support cables and lay hood on table. Remove hood pivot pins. Remove hood.
Drain engine coolant.
Disconnect power steering reservoir from radiator support frame, reposition and secure out of way for access.
Remove charge air hoses and pipes.
Disconnect all cooling hoses necessary to remove cooling system.
Remove upper radiator support struts and disconnect lower radiator support struts from radiator frame.

If A/C equipped remove condenser line support clamps, remove A/C condenser from radiator support frame. Reposition A/C condenser to right side of engine and secure out of way for access. Do not open A/C system. Use caution to prevent damage to condenser fins.
Remove serpentine belt. Remove fan/clutch assembly.
Install suitable lifting device to cooling system assembly.
Remove lower radiator support bolts.
Remove cooling system assembly.
Prior to damper removal, inspect the damper for wobble using a dial indicator.
Remove damper retaining bolts and retainer washer. Using suitable puller, remove damper.
Remove front wear sleeve from damper if necessary.
Remove front crankshaft oil seal, use seal puller.
Install front crankshaft seal, use proper seal installing tool.

Place damper directly on hot plate. Mark damper with a thermomelt crayon 388 degrees F and heat. When crayon melts, using welding gloves, install damper on crankshaft. Be sure to align keyway on damper with key on crankshaft.

note.para: Do not install damper when cold (room temperature)

step1.para: Apply RTV to damper retainer washer.

note.para: This prevents oil seepage through damper keyway.

step1.para: Install damper retainer washer and bolts, prevent damper from turning and torque bolts to specifications.
Install cooling system, install lower radiator support bolts.

note.para: Leave bolts loose at this time.

step1.para: Connect lower radiator struts and tighten lower radiator bolts now.
Remove lifting device.
Install serpentine belt and fan/clutch assembly.
Install A/C condenser and hose support clamps.
Install coolant hoses.
Install upper radiator support struts.
Install charge air hoses and pipes.
Connect power steering reservoir to radiator frame.
Fill engine coolant.
Install hood, pivot pins and support cables, and connect wiring to harness.
Install front bumper.
Connect battery.
Top off engine oil. Start engine and check for leaks. Top off engine coolant if necessary.
Close hood.
Remove wheel chocks.
